mapper.select: select m.* from t_role r join t_user_role ur on r.r_id = ur.r_id join t_menu m on ur.m_id = m.m_id where r.r_id = #{rId} and is_navigation = '0' order by m.m_sort, m.m_name desc
select t1.m_name as p_menu_name, t2.* from t_menu t1 join ( select * from t_menu where m_id = #{id} ) t2 on t1.m_id = t2.p_menu
